summary: Completed comprehensive testing of role-based access control for Admin, Teacher, and Parent dashboards. All features working correctly: 1) Admin dashboard shows email and logout button (no back to dashboard link), 2) Teacher dashboard shows username, logout button, and Learn module link, 3) Parent dashboard shows username, logout button, and Store module link, 4) All logout functions work correctly, 5) Teacher/Parent/Admin cannot access child dashboard - correctly redirected to their respective dashboards.
passed_tests: ✅ Admin Dashboard: Shows email in header (test.admin.xxx@example.com)
✅ Admin Dashboard: Logout button present with data-testid='admin-logout-btn'
✅ Admin Dashboard: No 'Back to Dashboard' link (correct for admin)
✅ Admin Logout: Redirects to landing page after logout
✅ Teacher Dashboard: Shows username in header (Test Teacher)
✅ Teacher Dashboard: Logout button present with data-testid='teacher-logout-btn'
✅ Teacher Dashboard: Learn module link present with data-testid='teacher-learn-link'
✅ Teacher Dashboard: 'Learning Content' text visible
✅ Teacher Learn Page: Navigates to /learn from teacher dashboard
✅ Teacher Learn Page: Shows 'Preview learning content' (teacher-specific text)
✅ Teacher Learn Page: Back button navigates to /teacher-dashboard
✅ Parent Dashboard: Shows username in header (Test Parent)
✅ Parent Dashboard: Logout button present with data-testid='parent-logout-btn'
✅ Parent Dashboard: Store module link present with data-testid='parent-store-link'
✅ Parent Dashboard: 'Virtual Store' text visible
✅ Parent Store Page: Navigates to /store from parent dashboard
✅ Parent Store Page: Shows 'Shopping List Ideas' (parent-specific text)
✅ Parent Store Page: Shows 'View items for shopping list chores' (view-only mode)
✅ Parent Store Page: Back button navigates to /parent-dashboard
✅ Role-based Redirect: Teacher accessing /dashboard redirects to /teacher-dashboard
✅ Role-based Redirect: Parent accessing /dashboard redirects to /parent-dashboard
✅ Role-based Redirect: Admin accessing /dashboard redirects to /admin
✅ Child Dashboard: Child user can access /dashboard normally
✅ Child Dashboard: Shows child-specific content (Hey, [name]!, money jars, quests)
critical_code_review_comments: AdminPage.jsx: Correctly displays user email in header, has logout button with data-testid, no 'Back to Dashboard' link
TeacherDashboard.jsx: Correctly displays username, has logout button and Learn module link with proper data-testids
ParentDashboard.jsx: Correctly displays username, has logout button and Store module link with proper data-testids
Dashboard.jsx: Correctly blocks non-child users with useEffect redirect to their respective dashboards
LearnPage.jsx: getBackLink() correctly returns /teacher-dashboard for teachers
StorePage.jsx: getBackLink() correctly returns /parent-dashboard for parents, isParentViewMode shows view-only UI
seed_data_creation: Created test users (admin, teacher, parent, child) with sessions for testing. Test data cleaned up after testing.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Role-based access control fully tested and working. Key data-testids: admin-logout-btn, teacher-logout-btn, parent-logout-btn, teacher-learn-link, parent-store-link, teacher-dashboard, parent-dashboard, dashboard, learn-page, store-page. Dashboard.jsx redirects non-child users to their respective dashboards. LearnPage.jsx and StorePage.jsx have getBackLink() functions that return correct back navigation based on user role.
